alert.note: Alert for Coastal Brunswick; Columbus; Inland Brunswick (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 5:31PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Brunswick, south central Columbus and east central Horry Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 531 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Nakina to Little River Entrance. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... North Myrtle Beach, Shallotte, Sunset Beach, Holden Beach, Ocean Isle Beach, Little River, Iredell, Carolina Shores, Calabash, Bethel, Lake Waccamaw, Makatoka, Civie Town, Freeland, Nakina, Exum, Bughill, Longwood, Seaside and Ash. This includes US Route 17 in Brunswick County between mile markers 1 and 19. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
